title: Madame Doubtfire
description: Lydia, Christopher and Natalie Hillard are used to domestic turmoil and have been torn between their warring parents ever since their divorce. That all changes when their mother takes on an unusual cleaning lady. But there is much more to Madame Doubtfire than meets the eye...Madame Doubtfire inspired the highly successful film Mrs Doubtfire.
author: Anne Fine
